document.full_text: lindsey vonn was heartbroken when the weather cost her a chance for a fourth successive world cup title on saturday but promised she would be as good as ever next season, if not better.
document.title: heartbroken vonn says she will be back
lines_and_colors: lindsey vonn was heartbroken when the weather cost her a chance for a fourth successive world cup title on saturday but promised she would be as good as ever next season, if not better.
